comment.body: Hi, it is similar like on a twitter...

@blurhy was creating advanced search engine called Horizon. He stopped/paused, i think due for zeronet not having technology to make it run well and fast with all its needed functions. Check [his blog post](/12q9YNb5oJ331nTjUxWefV9W2EXpMu8RWi/2019/08/22/ck732tgpi000ctwwidyn6hsm9/) and here [wiki](/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:horizon)

Another nice SE project is [Dream search](/1JBFNPrAGp1nQX6RsAN6oRqCfvtoeWoion/) by @lavaphox
